name: Fudgy Vegan Chocolate Bark with Cramberries and Almonds
description: Fudgy Vegan Chocolate Bark with Cramberries and Almonds. Vegan palm oil free recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 cup vegan palm oil free semi-sweet chocolate chips
1/2  cup pure Cocoa butter (more the merrier)
1/4 cup So Delicious Coconut creamer (or cream from full fat coconut milk)
3 Tablespoons finely ground raw sugar (or date paste of 4-5 dates or maple syrup)
2 Tablespoons cocoa powder (more for darker or less/omit for lighter)
Toppings: Dried Cranberries (coarsely ground almonds or almond slivers)
Variations: Add a Tablespoon or so Liqueur of choice (or rum extract to the chocolate mixture.)

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan on low heat, bring the coconut creamer/coconut milk cream to an almost boil.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan on low heat, bring the coconut creamer/coconut milk cream to an almost boil.

recipeInstructions.text: (Chill a full fat coconut milk can for a few hours. Scoop the opaque cream from the top and use)
recipeInstructions.name: (Chill a full fat coconut milk can for a few hours. Scoop the opaque cream from the top and use)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients and keep mixing for 1-2 minutes continuously till almost everything melts.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients and keep mixing for 1-2 minutes continuously till almost everything melts.

recipeInstructions.text: Take off heat and whisk for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Take off heat and whisk for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool for 2 minutes, then whisk again for half a minute to get a smooth mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour on parchment and spread using a spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Top with dried fruit and nuts of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Chill the refrigerator for half an hour.
recipeInstructions.name: Chill the refrigerator for half an hour.

recipeInstructions.text: Break into pieces and store in airtight container in a cool place. If your counter is going to be warm, then store in the refrigerator.
